special_text:
[0]: Up to one target creature you control gains flying until end of turn. If it already has flying, it gains hexproof until your next turn instead.
[0]: Until end of turn, Nox becomes a 2/2 Bird creature with flying that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to her this turn. Whenever she deals combat damage to a player this turn, look at their hand.
